lines: veena ke achchhe svabhaav se saasasasur va devar bhee bahut prabhaavit the
dev ke pita shreeraam ka svabhaav vaise bhee ghar mein sabase achchha tha
sabaka bhala chaahane vaala shreeraam subah se shaam tak ghar mein hote hue bhee anupasthitasa rahata tha
na beton ke kaam mein dakhalandaajee karana aur na hee ghar mein kisee kaam mein
bas subah shaam pooja ke atirikt din bhar apane aasapados peechhe dukaanadaaron ka haalachaal aur apane rishtedaaron ke duhkh sukh kee niyamit roop se khabar lete rahana shreeraam kee dinacharya thee
krshna thodee svabhaav kee chidachidee thee
lekin veena ke achchhe svabhaav ke kaaran aur ghar mein dev va amit ke dabadabe ke kaaran vah veena se madhur sambandh banae hue thee
lekin usake mane mein is baat kee jara bhee koee shanka nahin thee ki usaka putr veena ke maamale mein kaheen kam hai
vah apanee baaton se yahee mahasoos karavaatee thee veena ko ki dev shuroo se shaadee kee tadakabhadak ke khilaaph tha aur rishton ke lie bhee koee kamee nahin thee
bas vah shaadee tabhee karana chaahata tha jab tak ki apane pairon par khada na ho jae
risarch ke baad do saal tak koee naukaree nahin lagee thee usakee
skolaraship ke sahaare vah apanee shaadee ka khyaal nahin la sakata tha
doosare usake bhaagy mein takaleeph likhee thee
beemaaree se peechha chhoota tabhee vah shaadee ke lie maana
krshna kee jindagee apane ghar kee chaaradeevaaree mein hee katee thee
use nahin maaloom tha ki duniya kahaan se kahaan pahunch gaee hai
usake bachche usakee aankhon ke saamane bhalechange khade hain to vah samajhatee thee saaree duniya bhalee hai
usake bachchon ko koee duhkh hai to usako lagata tha saaree duniya mein duhkhon ka pahaad toot pada hai
veena apanee saas ke gyaan kee seema ko samajhatee thee tabhee use usakee kisee baat ka duhkh nahin hota tha
aakhir vah apane bete kee shubhachintak thee aur veena ko dev ka har shubhachintak apana lagane laga tha
kyonki dev usaka suhaag tha
apane suhaag kee mangalakaamana hee usaka pratham kartavy bana hua tha
shaadee se pahale usane skool se do maheene kee chhuttee le lee thee
saaree yojana usane soch samajh kar banaee thee
do maheene beetate hee garmee kee do maheene kee chhuttiyaan ho jaatee theen
kul milaakar chaar maheene use dev ke saath mil rahe the
ekadoosare ko samajhane ke lie itana samay kaaphee hota hai
use vishvaas bhee tha ki is beech vah kendriy vidyaalay sangathan se apanee dillee mein badalee karava legee
aisa hee kiya dev ne
usakee badalee ke lie bhee daudadhoop shuroo kar dee thee
udhar veena kee saas ko ek hee baat aajakal karane ko rahatee thee
jab bhee veena unake paas baithatee yahee sunane ko milata use  hamaare samay mein to pahala bachcha shaadee ke ek saal ke bheetar ho jaata tha
dekho meree maanon tum bhee yahee karana
koee golee khaane ke chakkar mein na pad jaana
jaldee se mujhe daadee bana do
tum apane skool aaraam se jaatee rahana bachche ko main sambhaal loongee
yah sunakar veena muskura bhar detee
kaise bataatee apanee saas ko ki abhee to kisee apraakrtik saadhan kee use jaroorat hee nahin padee hai
abhee to shareer ka sampark keval sahalaane bhar ka hai aur vah bhee usee mein hee apana man lagae hai
vakt aaega sab theek ho jaega
jaroorat hai abhee dev ko tanaav mukt rahane kee
dev tanaav mein rahata tha aksar shaam beet jaane ke baad
ekaek use lagane lagata tha ki jaise raat aate hee use veena ke saamane pareeksha denee hogee
aur vah us pareeksha mein svayan ko samay aane se pahale hee asaphal paata
haan kitaaben padhanee shuroo kee theen usane
dher see kitaaben padhakar un par amal karane kee koshish bhee kee thee
veena ne sadaiv usaka saath bhee diya
lekin dev apana sanyam samay se pahale hee kho deta tha
in kitaabon ke sahaare hee vah jaan paaya aur sada koshish bhee karata tha ki veena ko vah apane sparsh se kuchh raahat de sake
aur veena vah isee sparsh kee divaanee banee dev ke lie ghanto praarthana karatee thee
usane apana dhyaan shaareerik sampark se hatha rakha tha
jo mil jaata tha usee mein hee santusht rahane vaalee thee vah
aur aise vyakti ko sukh kee paribhaasha bahut saral lagatee hai
yahee suna tha usane apane ghar mein pita ke mukh se ki  sukh saadhana hai sukh aaraadhana hai sukh mol liya nahin jaata sukh vahee roop jo ham pahachaanen
jo ho raha hai us mein sukh khojo
jo duhkh lagata hai usamen sukh khojo yah geeta bhaav usake manapraanon mein basa tha aur usee bhaav mein vah jeena seekh rahee thee
aise hee vakt beetata ja raha tha
amit ke jeevan mein bahaar aa gaee thee
dev kee shaadee ke baad use apanee jindagee mein naee khushiyaan dikhane lagee theen
veena bhaabhee ka divaana tha vah
nimmee aur maalatee bhaabhee ka saath to use bahut kam mila tha
donon hee apaneeapanee grhasthee mein itanee vyast theen ki saal mein jabajab bhaee chhuttee par aate tabhee chand dinon ka saath use apanee bhaabhiyon ka mil paata tha
aise mein usase jo ban padata vah unakee teemaaradaaree mein laga rahata
ghar ka chhota sabase isee mein khush rahata tha ki ve sab jab bhee aateen amit ye lao amit vo lao
amit mere saath baazaar chalo kahakar use itana mahatv detee hain
jaise usake bina har kisee kee dinacharya adhooree rahatee hai
aise mein veena ko bhaabhee ke roop mein apane aasapaas dekhakar vah bahut prasann tha
vaise bhee veena use apanee doosaree bhaabhiyon se bilkul alag lagee
ek to vah dev kee patnee thee
dev jo usake man ke bahut nikat tha
dev jo aaj use khush dikhata tha
dev ko usane kasht sahate dekha tha
bahut kareeb raha vah usake un kshanon mein
dev kee ekek karaahat use yaad hai
aise mein apane bhaee dev ke chehare par veena ke aa jaane se jo khushee use dekhane ko milee usee ne use veena ka divaana bana diya
veena achchhee hai
bahut achchhee hai
isase adhik vah bhee veena ke dil ko nahin jaan paaya
nahin jaan paaya ki usaka dil to dev kee mangalakaamana mein laga rahata hai
usake man kee thaah lena kathin tha
hamen jis baat kee khabar hotee hai usee kee sochate hain
apane man kee gaharaeeyon mein sadaiv vahee baat ghar karatee hai jo svayan se sambandhit ho
apana man theek hai to lagata hai doosare ka man bhee theek hoga
amit ko veena ke chehare par sukh bhaav hee dikhate the aur aise mein vah usake bhaavon mein apane prati sneh bhaav hee paata tha
veena ko usase baat karana achchha lagata hai
vah veena se haradam baat karane ko tatpar rahata tha
subah kaam par jaane se pahale nity vah veena se ek hee prashn poochhata tha  bhaabhee ja raha hoon kisee cheez kee jaroorat ho to bataana
shaam ko leta aaoonga  ya phir ki  bhaabhee ja raha hoon
bhaee ko poochh lena naeetasho pikchar jaana ho to tikat leta aaoonga
aise mein veena muskura kar yahee kahatee  main to pikchar jaane ko haradam taiyaar rahatee hoon
apane bhaee se svayan poochh lo
jaana chaahenge to mujhe kya aitaraaz hoga
veena ko deharaadoon se maan ka patr aata
shaam ko laut kar use yah khabar bhee apanee maan se mil jaatee thee
yahee poochhane kee chaah hotee usakee ki maan ne priya ke baare mein kuchh likha hai ya nahin aur priya ka patr jab aata to usakee koshish rahatee ki vah usake likhe shabdon ko padh le
kaheen shabd apana roop badal kar usaka naam bhee likha dikha den
priya ke likhe ekado patr usane bahaane se padhe bhee the
yahee kah kar ki  bhaabhee mujhe dikhaeee priya ka patr
dekhoon usakee likhaee ko main
usake bhavishy ke baare mein bata doonga
aur veena hansate hue use patr dikha detee thee
man hee man samajhane lagee thee ki amit kaheen na kaheen kisee roop mein priya ko pasand karata hai
vah usake likhe shabdon mein apana roop khojata hai
lekin priya ke patron kee ibaarat mein use aisa kuchh na dikhaee deta
kaheen bhee apana naam na likha milata
kuchh aksharon ko mitaakar kuchh akshar jod kar bhee apana naam nahin bana dikhata tha
veena ko bhee amit ke manobhaavon kee khabar laganee shuroo ho gaee thee
priya ke prati usakee utsukata dekhakar vah samajh rahee thee amit ke man mein bas rahee priya kee bhaavanaon ko
amit sarvagun sampann laga use
priya ke prati uchit var
lekin aisa sochakar vah pareshaan bhee ho jaatee thee
dev se usake vivaah se ab tak to sab theek chal raha tha
lekin kaheen kuchh ho gaya tab lekin kshanabhar mein usake sanskaar use isase adhik sochane ko rok dete the
dev ko ab kuchh nahin ho sakata
dev ab bilkul theek hai
use ab kuchh nahin hoga
aur aise mein amit ka is sabase kya lena
vah to bilkul theek hai
usakee apanee bhee to jindagee hai sabakee thaah lene vaala apanee patnee ko kitana khush rakhega isakee kalpana karate hee priya ka khila chehara usakee aankhon se utar kar usake dil mein sama jaata
priya amit ko paakar jeevan mein bahut khush rahegee
usake lie amit hee achchha var hai
ghar vaalon ke prati vah nishchit bhee thee
unhen dev kee pichhalee jindagee ka nahin pata
dev theek rahega to unhen kuchh pata bhee nahin lagega
aur dev theek rahega ab aisa usaka man kahata hai
aisee hee usakee kaamana hai
amit ko vah dev se alag karake dekhane lagee
amit ke gun use dev se bhee oopar lagane lage
padhaee pooree karane ke baad usane apane dam par apana vyaapaar shuroo kiya tha aur vah dinaraat mehanat karake oopar hee uth raha tha
din bhar kaam mein vyast rahata
shaam ko apane parivaar ke lie sukhasaadhan jutaane mein vyast rahata
shaadee se pahale veena ko vyaapaar karane vaalon kee dinacharya ka jyaada aabhaas na tha
amit kee dinacharya dekhakar use laga ki naukaree pesha se apana vyaapaar karane vaale bees hee hote hain
unhen sab sukhasaadhan jutaane mein koee pareshaanee nahin hotee

aise mein veena ne apane har patr mein sabakee kushalata ke vishay mein likhane ke saathasaath amit ke baare mein usakee dinacharya ke baare mein usake vyaktitv kee visheshataon ke baare mein kuchh na kuchh likhana shuroo kar diya
maan ko to vah likhatee hee thee priya ko bhee thodaabahut likhane lagee
lekin priya ko apanee deedee ke man mein apane prati basatee ja rahee chaahana kee khabar nahin lag paee

veena ke patron kee ibaarat mein amit ka naam amit kee prashansa padhapadhakar vah amit ke vishay mein sochatee jaroor thee lekin aisa kabhee bhee usake man mein vichaar nahin aaya tha ki usakee deedee amit va usaka sambandh banaane kee soch rahee hai
haan veena deedee ke patr padhakar chhotee bahan geeta jaroor usase chutakee lete hue kahatee thee  veena deedee apane har patr mein amit ke vishay mein dher saaree baaten likhatee hain
kaheen unaka man tumhen apanee devaraanee banaane ka to nahin
aise mein priya muskura bhar detee thee
lekin yah silasila jab har patr mein chalane laga to usake man ne bhee amit kee kalpana se sukhad anubhooti ka anubhav karana shuroo kar diya
lekin man kee baat usane apane man mein hee rakhee kisee ko isakee khabar na huee
aise mein kuchh din aur beete aur priya ka janmadin aa gaya
apane kolej kee sakhiyon ko usane shaam ko chaay par bula rakha tha
donon bahanen subah se hee sab taiyaaree mein jutee theen
dopahar kee daak se priya ke naam do shubhakaamana sandesh aae
ek kaard devaveena ka tha aur doosara amit ka
amit ka kaard mere naam sukhad aashchary hua use yahee socha usane jaroor veena deedee ne bataaya hoga use mere janmadin ka
aur muskura dee vah aisa sochakar
geeta ne dekha to maan se kahane lagee mammee dekho amit ne bheja hai priya ko kaard
chalo achchhee baat hai veena ne bataaya hoga use
aashchary hua donon ko maan ke manobhaav jaanakar
maan ko amit achchha lagata tha
yahee bolee  achchha ladaka hai
achchha ladaka hai lekin priya ko kitana achchha lagata hai yah bhee to dekhana hoga  geeta ne yah kahate hue priya ko chutakee kaatee
chal paagal kaheen kee kaard ko dekhakar baat kahaan kee kahaan le gaee  priya ne use pyaar se jhidakate hue kaha
lekin man hee man vah khush ho rahee thee
use samajh aa raha tha kuchhakuchh patron mein amit ke vishay mein baaten likhane ka veena deedee ka iraada
devaveena ke kaard ko usane draeengaroom mein saja diya aur amit ke kaard ko apanee ek pustak mein rakh liya
lekin geeta use chhedatee rahee dinabhar
priya thee ki usakee baaten sunakar muskuraatee rahee bolee kuchh nahin mukh se
amit ke prati komal bhaav panapane lage the usake man mein
aaj priya ka janmadin hai use kaard mil gaya hoga
shabd bhee dhoondh raha tha man mein veena ke kisee prashn ke uttar mein
lekin shabd the ki veena ke lie uttar khojane kee apeksha priya ke naam kee maala jape ja rahe the
shabd ekaek kaise kavita mein dhal gae ye kaise shabdon ka roop ekaek nikhar aaya
priya
kisee ke manobhaavon ka bimb
kisee kee aankhon ka ullaas
kisee ke hrday ka kanakan
athaah umangon ka darpan
mook magar
adharon par muskaan lie
chehare par ullaas kee aabha
aankhon mein ek preeti lie
kisee se neh ka naata jode
kisee se chintan ka hai saath
kisee kee aankhon kee hai jyoti
kisee kee jeevan kee prabhaat
pratipal naveenata ke darshan
nit naee umangon se milan
priya tum mera jeevan
jeevan kee utkrsht umang
bahut achchha laga use kavita likhakar
baarabaar use padhata
padhapadh kar man hee man khush hota
jee chaah raha tha usaka pankh lagaakar ud jae priya ke paas aur use suna aae apanee kavita
aisa nahin kar sakata tha vah yah samajh kar udaas ho gaya
bas apanee daayaree mein kavita likhakar use hee padhata raha
ab roj daayaree mein amit priya ke naam kuchh na kuchh shabd jodane laga
use sukhad aashchary hua ki ye shabd svayan ek kavita mein dhal kar saamane aa jaate the
jaisee usake man kee sthiti hotee thee vahee apanee lekhanee se priya ke naam likh daalata tha
aisa karake use lagata jaise priya se vah baaten kar raha hai
jaise priya usake saamane baithee hai
chaah hotee kabhee itanee ki veena bhaabhee se kah daale apane dil ka haal
aise mein ek do baar usane koshish bhee kee
lekin kah na paaya
phir usane anjaan banate hue apanee daayaree ko aisee jagah rakhana shuroo kar diya jahaan veena kee nazar us par aasaanee se ja sakatee thee
lekin phir bhee veena ko nahin pata laga
veena ne daayaree dekhee jaroor par uthaakar dekhane kee koshish nahin kee
aadat nahin thee usakee kisee kee nijee daayaree ko dekhane kee
